originalTitle: France invites Chad president in bid to ease troubled relations
title: France invites Chad president in bid to ease troubled relations
content: Franco-Chadian military relations have been strained after Chad abruptly ended its defence agreement with France.

originalTitle: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
title: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
content: Following an investigation some of the 16 detained last year are accused of planning to unseat President Bola Tinubu.

originalTitle: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
title: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
content: The UN mission says it is gravely concerned by "inflammatory rhetoric calling for violence against civilians".

originalTitle: Iraq presidential vote delayed as Kurdish blocs struggle to pick candidate
title: Iraq presidential vote delayed as Kurdish blocs struggle to pick candidate
content: Whoever is nominated from the two Kurdish parties still needs approval from the Shia and Sunni blocs in the parliament.

originalTitle: Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’ puts rights abusers in charge of global order
title: Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’ puts rights abusers in charge of global order
content: Trump’s latest assault on the UN replaces international law with power, money and impunity.

title: LIVE: Trump to pitch affordability amid outrage over protest killings
content: Trump set to attempt to pivot Republican messaging as he shows signs of softening on deadly Minnesota operation.

originalTitle: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger
title: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger
content: The US federal agency says it will not play an immigration role at February's event in Milan-Cortina.

originalTitle: India and EU announce 'mother of all trade deals'
title: India and EU announce 'mother of all trade deals'
content: The long-awaited deal comes as both Delhi and Brussels contend with economic and geopolitical pressure from the US.

originalTitle: Sweden aims to lower age of criminal responsibility to 13 as gangs recruit children
title: Sweden aims to lower age of criminal responsibility to 13 as gangs recruit children
content: Critics say the proposal could see even younger children becoming offenders as well as breaching children's rights.

originalTitle: Guardiola apologises to ref Hallam but 'defends' outburst
title: Guardiola apologises to ref Hallam but 'defends' outburst
content: Pep Guardiola has apologised to new Premier League referee Farai Hallam if he "feels offended", having taken issue with the official following Manchester City's victory over Wolves on Saturday. But the Spaniard said he has to "defend my club and my players".

originalTitle: Spain to host 2030 World Cup final, federation says
title: Spain to host 2030 World Cup final, federation says
content: Spain "will be the leader of the 2030 World Cup and the final of that World Cup will be held here" says the president of the country's football federation.

content: Bournemouth have made 19-year-old Brazilian forward Rayan their second most-expensive signing. Who is he and how good can he be?
